law.catch_line: Creation of Abandoned Mine Lands Program -- Reclamation fund -- Use of fund.

text.section: There is hereby created within the Commonwealth of Kentucky an Abandoned Mine Lands Program, to be administered within the Energy and Environment Cabinet. The secretary of the Energy and Environment Cabinet may promulgate regulations necessary to implement this program. The provisions of KRS 350.150, 350.152, 350.154, 350.156(1) and (2), 350.158, 350.161, and 350.163 shall not be applicable to this program.
The Finance and Administration Cabinet is hereby directed to establish a fund to be known as the abandoned mine reclamation fund (hereinafter referred to as the "fund").

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1891, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 2, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 18.
